{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1169|Year of the Trees 1170|Year of the Trees 1172|Year of the Trees 1182|Year of the Trees 1185|Year of the Trees 1190|Year of the Trees 1200}}

* After twelve years since the death of [[Míriel]] in {{YT|1170}},<ref>{{AA|78|note}}, p. 101</ref> "[[Statute of Finwë and Míriel]]" is proclaimed by [[Mandos]] and [[Manwë]], and [[Finwë]] is allowed to marry again after Míriel finally refuses to be brought back to life.<ref name="LQ2">{{MR|P3II4}}, p. 258</ref>

== Other versions of the legendarium ==
* In earlier versions, the [[Statute of Finwë and Míriel]] was proclaimed on {{YT|1172}}.<ref name="Annals">{{MR|P2k}}, p. 101</ref><ref name="early">{{MR|P3II2}}, p. 205-7</ref>
